backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the portfolio backend that stores and retrieves contact messages (keyed by email) and exposes static contact info (email, GitHub, LinkedIn) via query and update methods.
backend/migration.mo: Data migration module that transforms the old actor state (with subject field and address/phone contact info) into the new schema (without subject, with GitHub/LinkedIn contact info).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented portfolio features (Hero, About, Skills, Projects, etc.) to their source files, component dependencies, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the portfolio's component and style files.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes used by shadcn-ui components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags, Open Graph properties, and keywords tailored for Afnan Tahib's AI & Data Science portfolio.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes all portfolio sections (Hero, About, Skills, Projects, Achievements, Education, Resume, Contact) with Navigation, Footer, and a Sonner toast provider.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About Me section displaying a profile image, education card, career goal, interest badges, and strengths grid using glassmorphism cards with scroll-triggered animations.
frontend/src/components/Achievements.tsx: Achievements & Certifications section with three glassmorphism columns for Certifications (with status badges), Workshops Attended, and a Hackathons/Research coming-soon state.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section component with a form (name, email, message) that submits via a React Query mutation, plus social links for Email, GitHub, and LinkedIn with toast notifications for success/failure.
frontend/src/components/Education.tsx: Education section component displaying a single timeline entry for a B.Tech in AI & Data Science at Priyadarshini Engineering College, including program details and key subjects.
frontend/src/components/Events.tsx: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/components/Faculty.tsx: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with a brand column, quick navigation links, social icons (GitHub, LinkedIn, Email), and a copyright notice with smooth-scroll support.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with an animated neural network canvas background, a profile introduction, and CTA buttons for scrolling to contact or other sections.
frontend/src/components/Labs.tsx: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with smooth-scroll links, active section highlighting based on scroll position, and a responsive mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/Placements.tsx: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/components/Programs.tsx: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/components/Projects.tsx: Renders a 'Featured Projects' section displaying two portfolio projects (a data science project and a Tableau dashboard) with tech stack badges, descriptions, and links to GitHub or live demos.
frontend/src/components/Research.tsx: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/Resume.tsx: Displays a resume section for Afnan Tahib with skill highlights and buttons to download or view the PDF resume online.
A wrapper component that uses IntersectionObserver to animate children into view with configurable direction (up, left, right, fade) and delay when they enter the viewport.
frontend/src/components/Skills.tsx: Renders a skills section with animated progress bars grouped into three categories (Programming, AI/ML, Tools & Libraries), each with color-coded styling and scroll-triggered bar animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing login/logout state via DFINITY's AuthClient and exposing identity, login status, and helper flags to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching contact info, submitting contact messages, and retrieving stored contact messages from the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts (Inter, Space Grotesk, JetBrains Mono), sets up Tailwind directives, and defines a dark AI-themed design system with OKLCH CSS custom properties for colors, gradients, glassmorphism, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens (including AI brand colors), border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations for the dark AI portfolio design system.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file (version 5) describing a personal AI/Data Science portfolio site for Afnan Tahib, listing architectural notes, existing features, image requirements, and build configuration for a dark-themed single-page React application.
